sentences.sContent: He might easily have been seen by someone who lived nearby.
sentences.sCn: 他可能很容易被住在附近的人看到。

sentences.sContent: The helicopter crashed to earth nearby.
sentences.sCn: 直升机坠毁在附近的地面上。

sentences.sContent: Lucy was staying in the nearby town of Hamilton
sentences.sCn: 露西当时住在附近的汉密尔顿镇。

trans.tranOther: If something is nearby, it is only a short distance away
